title: Healing Trauma Through Cannabis, With Fabian Henry
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Fabian Henry is founder and director of Breton CannaPharms and president and founder of Global Alliance Foundation Fund, which helps veterans recover from trauma. Fabian was recently featured in the documentary Unprescribed, which looks at medical marijuana as a treatment for PTSD and a means for combating veteran suicides and helping them return home from combat. On Veteran's Day, he joins Rena Sherbill to discuss why cannabis is the best medicine for trauma, the frustrating reality of legalized cannabis in Canada and the 4 pillars of treatment. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
